      • isConsumable

        public boolean isConsumable(int item_id)
                     throws DatabaseException
        Check if item in table SHOP is consumable or not
        Parameters:
        item_id - The item to decrement in the shop database. If the item is the last one in the shop, just update it's qty to 0.
        Returns:
        whether the item in shop is consumable or not
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • incrementItemQty

        public void incrementItemQty(int item_id,
                    int IncQty)
                      throws DatabaseException
        If item is not consumable, increment that item's quantity in table SHOP
        Parameters:
        item_id - The item to add into the shop database, referenced by it's id
        qty - The quantity of the items to add into the shop
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • decrementItemQty

                    int DecQty)
                      throws DatabaseException
        If item is not consumable, decrement that item's quantity in table SHOP
        Parameters:
        item_id - The item to decrement in the shop database. If the item is the last one in the shop, just update it's qty to 0.
        qty - The quantity of the items to add into the shop.
        Throws:
